text: Adam Joseph "Flip" Filipczak (February 12, 1915 – July 4, 1992) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Detroit Eagles in two games during the 1940–41 season. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1992 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Michigan Category:Detroit Eagles players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
title: Adam Filipczak
